top.title: Zelensky to speak to Trump after US proposes Russia-Ukraine peace plan
top.summary: The plan was reportedly drafted by US and Russian officials, without Ukraine's involvement.

top.title: Trump calls Democrats' message to troops seditious behaviour, punishable by death
top.summary: Trump's comments came after a group of Democrats urged US service members to refuse unlawful commands.

top.title: At least 41 dead as relentless rains flood Vietnam
top.summary: The coastal cities of Hoi An and Nha Trang, and a key coffee-producing belt, are among the worst-hit.

top.title: Vinted blocks 'sickening' sexually explicit ads
top.summary: The online marketplace removed adverts which included a video a user said depicted a pornographic scene.

top.title: Graduate jobs under threat from AI, PwC boss says
top.summary: The accountancy giant says artificial intelligence will eventually lead to fewer entry-level positions at the firm.

top.title: Streaming platform Twitch added to Australia's teen social media ban
top.summary: It joins other platforms including Facebook, Instagram, TikTok and Snapchat in the ban that starts next month.
